name: Exit The Room
description:
Exit the Room is a strategic game about getting out of a room by placing coins. You're a red square that can only rely on dice rolls to make movements. However you are able to place coins in the room that directs you in certain way. Will you be able to exit the room? 

The game is still in development. The final version will contain 49 levels (The demo above contains 7) and will be available for Windows/Mac/Linux/Android for 5$.

If you're interested in the game and want to be notified when the game is done please follow me on itch.io !
